Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the EPA director under Obama said the Clean Power Initiative would have no effect on man-made CO2 emissions.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the statement made by the EPA director under Obama is accurate and representative of the entire Clean Power Initiative.
Falters at times: The claim falters in providing a clear and direct statement from the EPA director under Obama regarding the effect of the Clean Power Initiative on man-made CO2 emissions.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or interpretations of the statements made by EPA administrators under Obama, which could challenge the claim's assertion.
